thread.title: BRIEF-Hydro One And Avista Receive First Of Several Regulatory Approvals For Proposed Merger

title: BRIEF-Hydro One And Avista Receive First Of Several Regulatory Approvals For Proposed Merger

organizations.name: avista receive first of several regulatory appro
avista receive first of several regulatory approvals for proposed merger

text:
11 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Hydro One And Avista Receive First Of Several Regulatory Approvals For Proposed Merger Reuters Staff 
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Avista Corp: 
* HYDRO ONE AND AVISTA RECEIVE FIRST OF SEVERAL REGULATORY APPROVALS FOR PROPOSED MERGER 
* HYDRO ONE LTD - CO & AVISTA CORPORATION RECEIVED APPROVAL FROM FEDERAL ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION ON MERGER APPLICATION Source text for Eikon:
